name: Angry Kid
description:
not a long game (like, 3 mins to play) I went with retro games and made a game where you are a TV and you have to get to the annoying kid so he can play his RETRO GAME

Also some (not so) subtle hints that you are not their first TV

All art is made by myself and the only asset I used was the jump sound effect which I got on mixKit.

WASD to move and escape to pause, that's about it! (also Angry kid was the best name I could think of lol)
